mdRecord.dcterms:title: Geological map and sections of the Pound quadrangle, Virginia / by Charles Butts ; assisted by D.D. Condit and W.A. Nelson ; surveyed in 1912 in co-operation with the United States Geological Survey
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Butts, Charles, 1863-1946
Condit, D. Dale (Daniel Dale), 1886-
Geological Survey (U.S.)
Nelson, Wilbur A. (Wilbur Armistead), 1889-
Virginia Geological Survey.
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 53 x 43 cm. on sheet 59 x 47 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Relief shown by contour lines and spot heights.
Includes formation sections and 3 cross sections.
Incldes a key to coal beds.
In upper margin: Virginia Geological Survey. Thomas Leonard Watson, DIrector. U.S. Geological Survey. Geo. Otis Smith, Director. Bulletin IX Plate III.

Appeared as plate 3 in: The coal resources and general geology of the Pound quadrangle in Virginia, by Charles Butts. Charlottesville, University of Virginia, 1914 (Virginia Geological Survey, Bulletin, no. 9)
